attributes.action: More government action to help Newham out of poverty
attributes.additional_details:
Newham has the highest rate of unemployment in London. It also has high rates of ill health and premature death. 30% of its LSOAs are in the 10% most deprived in the country.

I would like to see the government take the necessary steps in pushing more funds to assist the Borough in rising above the poverty line. I would also like to see the government auditing teams monitor the spending, ensuring the money is spent in accordance to the develpment of the borough.
